articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Ian Chappell retires from cricket commentary after 45 years
articles.description: Known for his forthright opinions on everything from batting technique to the way the sport was governed, Ian Chappell says he is retiring after health issues in recent years made the demands of the job harder.
articles.content:
Australian cricket great Ian Chappell has retired from commentary after almost half a century behind the microphone.
